mapper.insert:
insert into PregnantBigCheck( basic_id, k, na, cl, ca, p, co2, tp, alb, gb, whiteballratio, prealbumin, tba, tb, brd, urd, alt, got, alk, gpt, ldh, ce, glucose, bun, cr, ua, cystain, p_time
) values( #{basic_id}, #{k}, #{na}, #{cl}, #{ca}, #{p}, #{co2}, #{tp}, #{alb}, #{gb}, #{whiteballratio}, #{prealbumin}, #{tba}, #{tb}, #{brd}, #{urd}, #{alt}, #{got}, #{alk}, #{gpt}, #{ldh}, #{ce}, #{glucose}, #{bun}, #{cr}, #{ua}, #{cystain}, #{p_time} )
